channel.title: sweets on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in sweets on Barefoot Rob

item.title: last lesson with Sweets Party Attendants
item.description: 21:33 Wednesday 06 March 2019 JST Today was the last lesson with Sweets Attendants. (Their office is being shut down at the end of this month, but I am leaving next week for three weeks overseas.) I met Tomoko at CPK at 11am and helped her carry pizza to their office where we had a party, including candy I bought from the conveni ond 3F. The party was fun, but afterward I unfortunately let myself get sidetracked into dealing with some work related Excel spreadsheet crap, but got it sorted out by moving the spreadsheet into Google Sheets, where I can use the =FILTER() function.

item.title: Second to last lesson with Sweets Party Attendants
item.description: 21:26 Wednesday 13 February 2019 JST Sweets Party Attendants had their second to last lesson with me today. The mood was both somber and joyful; it has been great working with them over the years.
